name: Empressem Technologies
description:
Empressem Technologies,a leading provider of end-to-end mobility solutions offering augmented reality apps,web application development,iOS & Android application development and vistas visitors management. We are having a 100+ top-notch developers team with experience of more than 500+ projects in mobility.We help businesses leverage mobile technology to work smarter, grow faster, and provide a better experience for their customers.

Co-founded in 2010,we have been privileged to serve a wide array of industries not only in US but internationally as well.
We are providing enterprise mobility solutions across industry verticals which constitute - Healthcare,Retails,Education and Training,E-commerce, Social Media, Tech Startups, 
Enterprise Solutions as well as Management and Consulting. We are having expertise in SwiftObjective, CJ2ME, PhoneGap Xcode.Empressem exploring a world of infinite possibilities with augmented reality apps for the clients.
Empressem design and build mobile apps that are as beautiful as they are functional. We believe that user experience is what sets apart good apps from amazing apps. Not all mobile apps are built for customers – in fact, many of our apps have been designed to help our clients work more efficiently within their organization.
Based out of US, with our R&D centers in India we have been serving elite enterprises across the globe and majority of our clientele is based out of US,Canada,Middle-East,Australia and Europe.
READ MORE...
